1-2019-winter-tennis-olympics.description: The Winter Olympics is a competition between 4-person teams who compete in tennis-themed events.
1-2019-winter-tennis-olympics.title: Winter Tennis Olympics

3-2019-Spring-Mixed-Tournament.description: Come join us for Legacy Park's Spring Mixed Tournament.  There will be a bracket for every skill level (5.0, 6.0, 7.0, and 8.0)
3-2019-Spring-Mixed-Tournament.title: Spring Mixed Tournament

4-2019-margarita-mixer.description: Join us for Legacy Park's Margarita Mixer.  This will be a potluck style mixer.
4-2019-margarita-mixer.title: Margarita Mixer

5-2019-tennis-disc-golf-doubles-tourname.description: Join us for our annual tennis & disc golf tournament.  This will be a team competition in which each team competes in tennis and disc golf.
5-2019-tennis-disc-golf-doubles-tourname.title: Tennis & Disc Golf Tournament

6-2019-fall-classic.description: Come join us for Legacy Park's biggest tournament of the year.  There will be a bracket for every skill level ranging from 2.5 to 4.0+.
6-2019-fall-classic.title: Fall Classic Tournament

1-private-lessons.description: Time spent with a pro is the fastest way to improvement. We offer private, semi-private or private group lessons with a pro.
1-private-lessons.title: Private Lessons

2-team-drills.description: Group Drills are suitable for adults or juniors and often consist of practice games and drills that focus on the fun aspect of the game.
2-team-drills.title: Team Drills

3-league-play.description: Arrange your own matches, play different opponents each week or compete against other clubs in your region.
3-league-play.title: Leagues & Match Play

4-weekly-drills.description: Continue the development of stroke technique and strategy without a lengthy commitment. Get in maximum practice time.
4-weekly-drills.title: Weekly Drills & Clinics

5-events-tournaments.description: Find all levels of USTA-sanctioned camps, events and tournaments. Singles and doubles, both age- and level-specific.
5-events-tournaments.title: Events & Tournaments

6-member-mixers.description: Show up to play without having to find your own partner. Meet new tennis friends and compete every week.
6-member-mixers.title: Member Mixers

certs.description: USPTA and GPTA member, Certified Referee by USTA, prior to joining Legacy Park in 2007, was Head Pro for Town Lake Hills in Cherokee County.
Played tennis for Wallace College in singles and doubles, graduated from Auburn University.
USPTA Certified Elite Teaching Professional, with 25 years of teaching/coaching experience. Graduate of the Professional Tennis Management Program at Ferris State University.
Legacy Park Head Pro 2009-2012, 2009 USTA High Performance Tennis Coach, 2010 Certified AS-C/RPT Coaching Course, The Spanish Way to Develop Players.
International Tennis Performance Association (ITPA) Certified Tennis Performance Trainer (2013).

perks.description: One court named for sponsor during the duration of each event held throughout the calendar year (1st 6 platinum sponsors)
Sponsor name promoted in all communications to the tennis community prior to each event
Sponsor provided banner displayed at the tennis center during event
10 x 10 tent/table provided for sponsor promotions
Two paid entries to participate in the tournament
One court named for sponsor during the duration of each event held during of the event (1st 12 gold sponsors)
Sponsor name promoted in all communications to the tennis community prior to the event
Sponsor provided banner displayed at the tennis center during the event
10 x 10 tent/table provided for sponsor promotions
Two paid entries to participate in the tournament
Sponsor name promoted in all communications to the tennis community prior to the event
Sponsor provided banner displayed at the tennis center during the event
10 x 10 tent/table provided for sponsor promotions
One paid entry to participate in the tournament
Sponsor name promoted in all communications to the tennis community prior to the event
Sponsor provided banner displayed at the tennis center during the event
Food and/or beverages to be provided by sponsor for tournament attendees.
Sponsor allowed to provide advertising (e.g. menus, coupons, etc) at the event to promote their company.
